page.title: 06Entertainments
page.content: We looked at entertainments in Marston Montgomery. The two yearly entertainments are the pigeon shoot and the christmas play.The weekly entertainments are the ones that the children and teenagers go to most and they are the: social club on Mondays and Thursdays and the youth club.The home entertainments are the tv and the radio.Some people also like listening to music.The WI takes place once a month some people enjoy going to the theatre and they also like going to the cinema.There are also discos in the village hall.
